title: Axis Bank extends Rs 1 billion loan to Muthoot Capital to accelerate e-mobility in India
description: Axis Bank has extended a Rs 1 billion loan guarantee to Muthoot Capital, in partnership with GuarantCo, to promote electric vehicle adoption in rural and non-metro regions of India. This initiative aims to reduce emissions, enhance air quality, and provide affordable transport solutions while supporting the development of green infrastructure.
